credit_line: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
dimensions:
9 x 14 cm (3 9/16 x 5 1/2 in.), irregular
Sheet: 12.5 x 19 cm (4 15/16 x 7 1/2 in.)
title: Rough Sketch of Countryside with Small Stream and Billowing Clouds
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
description: Two large, dark trees in right foreground. In left foreground, a small river or stream that curves out of sight to right in distance. Behind, at left, second group of trees, and mountains on horizon in far distance. Towering cumulus clouds, detailed, fill the sky from the horizon up.
name: Sketchbook folio
